reviews.text: Casa Fuster is a great blend of old and new. Old being the Art Nouveau style of the 100 year old building and new being the electic modern style of the furnishings. The hotels and its staff are warm and welcoming.
reviews.title: My New Favorite Place

likes.disliked: — Smallish Pool - but better than nothing -- and it was on the roof with a great view!

reviews.title: Great Location
reviews.text: We booked using whatahotel and online website that provides special amenities to its partner hotels. Casa Fuster is in this virtuoso partner program and as a result the service provided was amazing. We were greated by the virtuoso staff at check-in and they made sure our stay was perfect - and that we received all of the special benes -- hotel room upgrade, wine/appetizer tasting with the hotel manager, free transport to the airport and breakfast each day. Plus they helped with all of our other details during our stay - including excellent restaurant recommendations/reservations.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I travel a ton and do not believe I have every had such fantastic service. Love this hotel!
reviews.title: Perfect romantic break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was travelling with my 8 year old daughter and we stayed for 4 nights. Barcelona is a super fun city - one of my favorties in the world. It truely has its own heart. The only disappointment for my daughter was the size of the rooftop pool. It is very small, but enough to cool off and the view from the rooftop is amazing! I told her it was better than not having one at all! This was still her favorite hotel too!
reviews.title: Sophisticated Charm

likes.liked: — The cleanliness, the staff, the breakfast, the location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a little balcony which had stone benches -- it was very tiny but enought to sit outside and enjoy the street view. Very charming! Considering we were on a busy street -- the hotel was super quiet. Our room had double doors, so we also didn't hear any noise from the hallway.
reviews.title: Lovely Small Hotel, Friendly somewhat clueless staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our recent four-day stay at the Hotel Casa Fuster was a highlight of our trip to Barcelona. The hotel is beautiful both inside and out. We booked a junior suite at a promotional rate which included a comprehensive breakfast in their basement dining room. There is wired Internet available in the room, and also computers in the lobby area.
reviews.title: Modernista gem in Barcelona

reviews.text: The top-notch front service team were always available to answer questions and provide help. Our room key intermittently stopped working one day, and they fixed this within a few minutes.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel but some issues

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The 3rd floor room itself had a small balcony overlooking the Passeig de Gracia, as did the rooftop terrace. There were two LCD televisions, in the bedroom and the living area. Bathroom amenities included robes, slippers, and Loewe bath/cosmetic products. The separate shower stall was huge, although the whirlpool bathtub was a bit on the small side.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in Great Location

reviews.text: We were celebrating my wife's birthday, and a nice bottle of cava and chocolates in our room one evening were a pleasant surprise. The location was quiet at night, and also excellent for shopping the February clearance sales.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are a fan of Modernista architecture or are looking for a romantic stay in Barcelona, the Casa Fuster would be a solid bet.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay at Hotel Casa Fuster

likes.liked: — Very helpful staff and access to the Internet in the lobby .

reviews.text: Booked Casa Fuster via Expedia where they had a very good rate. I was concern they would give me a bad room as a result of the low rate but that was not the case at all. I had a nice corner room. The building is amazing and has been refurbished to very high standards. Breakfast is in a very nice room downstairs but is does not have windows so you may want to consider getting breakfast elsewhere.
reviews.title: Amazing building

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely nothing but praise for this first class hotel. The location was perfect and having booked through What a Hotel found that we had the most amazing upgrade and lots of little touches that just make the difference between a good hotel and a luxury hotel.
reviews.title: Exceeded expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate in the main restuarant and the food was excellent.
reviews.title: Not a Five Star Hotel

likes.disliked: — Bad layout of room, small closet, no dresser. The keying system is a joke.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing was too much trouble and the staff were exceptionally courteous and friendly.
reviews.title: Great personal service

reviews.text: Having researched many of the hotels before we went, I am just so pleased that we picked Casa Fuster and would advise anyone else to do the same!
reviews.title: Loved the Casa Fuster Hotel

likes.liked: — Safe quiet convenient location with excellent service.

reviews.text: I have rated this hotel 2 star only because it falls so short of the five star it claims. I stayed with my wife for one night prior to a cruise from the Port on a ship that WAS almost 5 stars the brilliance of the Seas.
